languages.text: "Тогда наши пути расходятся. Я найду способ исправить вопиющие нарушения Лекс Империалис, но уже без вас, Вольный Торговец"
"Then our paths diverge. I will find a way to rectify the flagrant violations of the Lex Imperialis, but without you, Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Тогда наши пути расходятся. Я найду способ исправить вопиющие нарушения Лекс Империалис, но уже без вас, Вольный Торговец"

traits.locale_text: "Then our paths diverge. I will find a way to rectify the flagrant violations of the Lex Imperialis, but without you, Rogue Trader."
"Then our paths diverge. I will find a way to rectify the flagrant violations of the Lex Imperialis, but without you, Rogue Trader."
"Then our paths diverge. I will find a way to rectify the flagrant violations of the Lex Imperialis, but without you, Rogue Trader."
"Then our paths diverge. I will find a way to rectify the flagrant violations of the Lex Imperialis, but without you, Rogue Trader."
"Then our paths diverge. I will find a way to rectify the flagrant violations of the Lex Imperialis, but without you, Rogue Trader."

languages.text: "Dann trennen sich unsere Wege hier. Ich werde auch ohne Euch einen Weg finden, die offenkundigen Verstöße gegen das Lex Imperia zu ahnden, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: "Then our paths diverge. I will find a way to rectify the flagrant violations of the Lex Imperialis, but without you, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Dann trennen sich unsere Wege hier. Ich werde auch ohne Euch einen Weg finden, die offenkundigen Verstöße gegen das Lex Imperia zu ahnden, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."

languages.text: « Alors, nos chemins divergent. Je trouverai un moyen de remédier à ces infractions flagrantes à la Lex Imperialis, mais sans vous, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "Then our paths diverge. I will find a way to rectify the flagrant violations of the Lex Imperialis, but without you, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Alors, nos chemins divergent. Je trouverai un moyen de remédier à ces infractions flagrantes à la Lex Imperialis, mais sans vous, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: “既然如此，我们就此分道扬镳吧。我会想办法纠正违背帝国法典的恶行，但不再有你的陪伴，行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: "Then our paths diverge. I will find a way to rectify the flagrant violations of the Lex Imperialis, but without you, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，我们就此分道扬镳吧。我会想办法纠正违背帝国法典的恶行，但不再有你的陪伴，行商浪人。”

languages.text: «En ese caso, nuestros caminos se separan. Encontraré una forma de rectificar las violaciones flagrantes de la Lex Imperialis, pero será sin usted, Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "Then our paths diverge. I will find a way to rectify the flagrant violations of the Lex Imperialis, but without you, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «En ese caso, nuestros caminos se separan. Encontraré una forma de rectificar las violaciones flagrantes de la Lex Imperialis, pero será sin usted, Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: 「ならば私たちの道は分かれます。ローグトレーダー、私はあなたなしで、レックス・インペリアの明らかな違反を正す方法を見つけるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Then our paths diverge. I will find a way to rectify the flagrant violations of the Lex Imperialis, but without you, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「ならば私たちの道は分かれます。ローグトレーダー、私はあなたなしで、レックス・インペリアの明らかな違反を正す方法を見つけるでしょう」

languages.text: "O hâlde yollarımız ayrılıyor. Lex İmperialis'i alenen ihlal edenlerle bir şekilde başa çıkacağım. Ancak siz olmadan Hür Tacir."
languages.original_text: "Then our paths diverge. I will find a way to rectify the flagrant violations of the Lex Imperialis, but without you, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "O hâlde yollarımız ayrılıyor. Lex İmperialis'i alenen ihlal edenlerle bir şekilde başa çıkacağım. Ancak siz olmadan Hür Tacir."
